name: YouTube Thumbnail Downloader

name: GitHub Stats
description: Analyze GitHub profiles and repositories. Get detailed statistics, contribution graphs, and repository insights.

name: JSON to CSV
description: Convert JSON data to CSV format with custom field mapping.

name: JSON to YAML
description: Convert JSON data to YAML format with proper indentation.

name: CSS Units Converter
description: Convert between different CSS units (px, em, rem, vh, vw, etc).

name: Image Resizer
description: Resize and optimize images with custom dimensions and formats.

name: SVG Viewer
description: View, optimize and edit SVG files with live preview.

name: API Cost Calculator
description: Calculate the cost of using an API based on usage and pricing.

name: Cloud Storage Lifecycle Cost Estimater

name: Password Generator
